basics.name: Dimitrios Dentsas
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer who is passionate about working on solutions that bring value to business users through the help of technology. I have experience in software engineering, cloud & containers, web design and services for applications on GCP and AWS. My tech stack is Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, SQL, Linux, Kubernetes among many other technologies I learned over the years.

work.position: Software Engineer Kubernetes as a Service - Bosch Private Cloud
work.summary: Member of a cross-functional agile team of 5 people working tirelessly to provide a fully automated, managed Kubernetes service for Bosch internal business customers.
highlights: Building a Kubernetes service offering on our onâ€“prem cloud platform
Development and operations
Close collaboration with customers
Striving for regular improvements. Driving to deliver value even under non ideal circumstances
Regular knowledge exchange and tutoring of colleagues
Mentoring of new employees and student apprentices

work.summary: Helping the team grow and build Software better.
highlights: Driving the agile development of the team, the agile coaches and our surroundings
Educating team members in the agile mindset
Providing methods and supporting the team with their 'inspect and adapt' journey

work.summary: DevOps evangelist, Continuous Delivery practicioner and test automation expert for the Bosch IoT Cloud. Trying to make cloudy dreams come true.
highlights: Working in the testing team of the Bosch IoT Cloud
Conception and implementation of automated tests (functional / non-functional) in collaboration with Service-Owners
Design and architecture of distributed software staging workflow
Helping the organizaton adopt DevOps practices
Digitization and modernization of the risk management process of the organization
Collaborating with international teams

work.position: Software Engineer - Gasoline Systems Transmission Control
work.summary: Increasing engineering and developer productivity at Bosch's Gasoline Systems Transmission Control business unit. Conception and development of a configuration management strategy for customer project software as well as development tools.
highlights: Conception, implementation and quality assurance of web-based tooling solutions
Configuration management strategies for versioning and dependency management of complex software subsystems
Supporting the design of change management and release processes
Used technologies: Java, Javascript, HTML, JUnit, Gradle, ANT, Maven, OSGi, Eclipse, RTC SCM, Tomcat, Derby

work.summary: Co-Founder of a company providing rental services for magic mirror photobooth systems for various events like weddings, birthdays and christmas parties.
highlights: Custom design and build of photobooth hardware and software
Distribution and customer acquisition
Design and operations of company website https://www.fotospiegelwelt.de

courses: Institute for Parallel and Distributed Systems
Institute of Architecture of Application Systems
